block.p: Bernardine Teresa Gaul was married last evening to Patrick Thomas Hare. The Rev. James E. McCurry, a Roman Catholic priest and a cousin of the bride, performed the ceremony at St. Michael's Cathedral in Springfield, Mass.

Mrs. Hare, 36, is a sales manager for Agostino Antiques in New York. She graduated from the University of Massachusetts. She is a daughter of Peggy B. Gaul of Holyoke, Mass., and the late John P. Gaul.

Bernardine Teresa Gaul was married last evening to Patrick Thomas Hare. The Rev. James E. McCurry, a Roman Catholic priest and a cousin of the bride, performed the ceremony at St. Michael's Cathedral in Springfield, Mass.

Mrs. Hare, 36, is a sales manager for Agostino Antiques in New York. She graduated from the University of Massachusetts. She is a daughter of Peggy B. Gaul of Holyoke, Mass., and the late John P. Gaul.

Mr. Hare, 34, is a group manager of consumer promotions at the Nabisco Biscuit Company in East Hanover, N.J. He graduated from St. Joseph's University in Philadelphia. He is a son of Joan P. Hare of Wilmington, Del., and the late John J. Hare.
